mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.area_id AS "area.id", a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.grade, a.address, a.zip_code, a.master, a.phone, a.fax, a.email, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable, a.primary_person, a.deputy_person, a.primary_person AS "primary.id", a.deputy_person AS "deputy.id", p.name AS "parent.name", ar.name AS "area.name", ar.parent_ids AS "area.parentIds", pp.name AS "primary.name", dp.name AS "deputy.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_area ar ON ar.id = a.area_id LEFT JOIN sys_user pp ON pp.id = a.primary_person LEFT JOIN sys_user dp ON dp.id = a.deputy_person
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_office a
WHERE a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.code
